column1: Smoque BBQ////I am an expert on baked beans
column2: have had many excellent variations of them home made and out
column3: but these rocked my world. The beans are smoked
column5: chunks of bacon and onion and taste so good as I write this I want them- now!. I didn't believe how fast I chowed down my side order. I wanted to head back on the kennedy to grab more before they closed. I restrained myself. But from now on large side of baked beans
column7: one to eat later in the week might be a treat. The side special of the day was brisket chili which I picked as a side. It was ok
column8: not something I would get again.
